title: 还是Eclipse的问题..
author: xmfxmf
txt_content:
求教,在Eclipse里run时出现了这些东西,而用gradlew则可以顺利启动.
[22:38:02] [main/ERROR] [FML]: The binary patch set is missing. Either you are in a development environment, or things are not going to work!
[22:38:03] [main/ERROR] [FML]: The minecraft jar file:/C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/.gradle/caches/minecraft/net/minecraftforge/forge/1.7.10-10.13.0.1180/forgeSrc-1.7.10-10.13.0.1180.jar!/net/minecraft/client/ClientBrandRetriever.class appears to be corrupt! There has been CRITICAL TAMPERING WITH MINECRAFT, it is highly unlikely minecraft will work! STOP NOW, get a clean copy and try again!
[22:38:03] [main/ERROR] [FML]: FML has been ordered to ignore the invalid or missing minecraft certificate. This is very likely to cause a problem!
[22:38:03] [main/ERROR] [FML]: Technical information: ClientBrandRetriever was at jar:file:/C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/.gradle/caches/minecraft/net/minecraftforge/forge/1.7.10-10.13.0.1180/forgeSrc-1.7.10-10.13.0.1180.jar!/net/minecraft/client/ClientBrandRetriever.class, there were 0 certificates for it
[22:38:03] [main/ERROR] [FML]: FML appears to be missing any signature data. This is not a good thing
[22:38:03] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.CoreModManager$FMLPluginWrapper
[22:38:03] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLDeobfTweaker
[22:38:04] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Launching wrapped minecraft {net.minecraft.client.main.Main}
[22:38:04] [main/ERROR] [LaunchWrapper]: Unable to launch

replies.author: 米安博奥
replies.txt_content:
ZCA 发表于 2014-8-30 22:52
看到一大堆代码我瞬间惊呆了.....
真是什么帖子都敢水

replies.author: xmfxmf
replies.txt_content:
ZCA 发表于 2014-8-30 22:53
不知道为什么一看到帖子就一定要按回复.......
别这样啊,有人知道为什么么

replies.author: 额无语
replies.txt_content:
ZCA 发表于 2014-8-30 22:52
看到一大堆代码我瞬间惊呆了.....
我要向你學習。。我都不敢亂水。。

replies.author: DeathWolf96
replies.txt_content:
ClientBrandRetriever.class appears to be corrupt! There has been CRITICAL TAMPERING WITH MINECRAFT, it is highly unlikely minecraft will work! STOP NOW, get a clean copy and try again!
这个应该是出现错误的原因。楼主确认是按照gradlew setupDecompWorkspace(或DevWorkspace) eclipse的方法进行了安装么？如果是，可能是下载或者解包中的某个环节出错导致class出错，建议用干净的Forge重新安装一遍

replies.author: xmfxmf
replies.txt_content:
DeathWolf96 发表于 2014-8-30 23:13
ClientBrandRetriever.class appears to be corrupt! There has been CRITICAL TAMPERING WITH MINECRAFT,  ...
如果用Eclipse自动配置命令的话,切换workplace直接崩掉是怎么回事,要怎么导入,求解释,谢谢

replies.author: xmfxmf
replies.txt_content:
DeathWolf96 发表于 2014-8-30 23:13
ClientBrandRetriever.class appears to be corrupt! There has been CRITICAL TAMPERING WITH MINECRAFT,  ...
似乎被我胡乱解决了.......不过还是谢谢
楼主怎么解决的啊，遇到一样的问题？
